subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Mack Brown’s Longhorns defeated visiting, and ranked, Oklahoma, to remain unbeaten in the Big 12 Conference and end a three-game losing streak to their rival.
snippet: Mack Brown’s Longhorns defeated visiting, and ranked, Oklahoma, to remain unbeaten in the Big 12 Conference and end a three-game losing streak to their rival.
